short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides keyboard shortcuts for Shopify stores to copy preview links, open theme editor and open admin

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your Shopify store management with efficient keyboard shortcuts available in a sleek, space-saving popup.

Quickly access essential Shopify functionalities such as copying preview links, opening theme editor, and admin dashboard with just a few clicks. The extension provides easy-to-use shortcuts that streamline your workflow and improve productivity.

Main Features
===================================
✓ 3 core functionality = Copy preview link, Open Admin, Open theme editor
✓ Section highlighter that instantly navigates you to the Shopify code editor for that specific section
✓ View theme details directly in the popup, including theme name, version, and status (e.g., draft or live)
✓ Convenient keyboard shortcuts for Shopify store actions like copying preview links and opening the theme editor 
✓ Access key Shopify features with customizable hotkeys
